Package api_b

Annotation Interface ExagonController

public @interface ExagonController
An annotation to identify classes with ExagonCommandHandler methods for processing subscribed events, as Exagon commands and Exagon notifications.

A class with this annotation must have at least one method annotated with ExagonCommandHandler.

See Also:
  • ExagonCommandHandler

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    infra.enums.ProcessTypeEnum
    handleType
    Returns the process type that labels this annotation.
